#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int i,t,n,p;
    char str[5];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        scanf("%s",str);
        scanf("%d",&p);
        if(str[0]=='o')
        {
            printf("%d\n",2*p);
        }
        else
            printf("%d\n",2*(p-1)+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
